about.title: About JSS Polytechnic
about.subtitle: Learn about our mission, history, and commitment to inclusive technical education

mission.title: Our Mission & Purpose
mission.description1: JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled is committed to providing accessible, quality technical education that empowers students with disabilities to achieve their full potential.
mission.description2: Our institution focuses on creating an inclusive learning environment where students can acquire skills, knowledge, and confidence needed to excel in the technical fields of their choice.
mission.imageAlt: Students learning in an accessible classroom environment

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: We envision a society where differently-abled individuals have equal opportunities in education and employment, contributing their unique perspectives and talents to the technical workforce.
vision.description2: Our goal is to be a center of excellence in technical education that bridges the gap between differently-abled students and employment opportunities in the industry.
vision.imageAlt: Group of diverse students collaborating on a project

history.title: Our History & Journey
history.subtitle: For over two decades, JSS Polytechnic has been pioneering accessible technical education

founding.title: Institution Founded
founding.description: JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled was established as the first specialized technical institution for differently-abled students in the region.

expansion.title: Campus Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded our facilities with new accessible laboratories, classrooms, and assistive technology resources to accommodate more students.

recognition.title: National Recognition
recognition.description: Received national recognition for excellence in accessible education and achievement in student placement outcomes.

today.title: Present Day
today.description: Today, JSS Polytechnic stands as a premier institution with state-of-the-art facilities serving hundreds of differently-abled students annually.

campus.title: Accessible Campus Features
campus.subtitle: Our campus is designed to provide a comfortable, accessible learning environment for students with various abilities

accessibility.title: Barrier-Free Design
accessibility.description: Ramps, elevators, and wide doorways throughout the campus for seamless mobility and access to all facilities.

technology.title: Assistive Technology
technology.description: Specialized software, hardware, and adaptive equipment to support different learning and communication needs.

support.title: Support Services
support.description: Dedicated counselors, interpreters, and support staff available to assist students throughout their educational journey.

leadership.title: Leadership & Management
leadership.subtitle: Meet the dedicated team guiding our institution towards excellence

director.name: Dr. Suresh Kumar
director.bio: With over 25 years of experience in inclusive education, Dr. Kumar leads our institution with a vision of innovation and excellence.

principal.name: Dr. Lakshmi Devi
principal.bio: An expert in educational psychology and accessibility, Dr. Devi oversees the academic excellence and student development programs.

dean.name: Prof. Rajesh Sharma
dean.bio: Professor Sharma ensures comprehensive support systems for our students while fostering a vibrant campus community.

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.subtitle: Explore our diverse range of accessible technical diploma programs designed for differently-abled students

computerScience.title: Computer Science & IT
computerScience.description: Programs focusing on software development, programming, web technologies, and information systems with accessible learning tools.

mechanical.title: Mechanical Engineering
mechanical.description: Courses covering mechanical design, manufacturing, CAD/CAM, and production processes with adaptations for differently-abled students.

electronics.title: Electronics & Communication
electronics.description: Programs in circuit design, communications, embedded systems, and signal processing with specialized accessibility features.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development & Design
webDevelopment.description: Comprehensive diploma focusing on accessible web design, front-end and back-end development with industry-standard tools.
webDevelopment.imageAlt: Student working on web development project

cadDesign.title: CAD/CAM Design
cadDesign.description: Specialized diploma in computer-aided design and manufacturing with adaptive equipment for differently-abled students.

embeddedSystems.title: Embedded Systems
embeddedSystems.description: Technical diploma focused on designing and programming embedded systems with IoT applications and accessibility features.
embeddedSystems.imageAlt: Students working on embedded systems project

dataAnalytics.title: Data Analytics
dataAnalytics.description: Modern diploma program covering data analysis, visualization, and basic machine learning with accessible tools and methods.
dataAnalytics.imageAlt: Student analyzing data on accessible workstation

admission.title: Admission Process
admission.subtitle: Follow these steps to begin your journey at JSS Polytechnic

apply.title: Submit Application
apply.description: Complete and submit the online or offline application form along with the required application fee.

documents.title: Submit Documents
documents.description: Provide academic certificates, disability certificate, and other required documents for verification.

assessment.title: Assessment & Interview
assessment.description: Attend the assessment and interview process designed to understand your learning needs and abilities.

enrollment.title: Enrollment & Orientation
enrollment.description: Upon selection, complete the enrollment process and attend the orientation program to begin your journey.

hero.title: JSS Mahavidyapeetha
hero.subtitle: A legacy of excellence in education spanning over five decades

history.title: History of JSS Mahavidyapeetha
history.description1: JSS Mahavidyapeetha was founded by His Holiness Jagadguru Sri Shivarathri Deshikendra Mahaswamiji in 1954 at Mysuru.
history.description2: The institution was established with the noble vision of providing quality education to all sections of society, irrespective of caste, creed, religion, or economic status.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: JSS Mahavidyapeetha believes in the Vedic concept of 'Sarve Janah Sukhino Bhavantu' (May all beings be happy) and strives to create an educational environment that nurtures human values alongside academic excellence.

members.name: Jagadguru His Holiness Sri Sri Sri Shivarathri Deshikendra Mahaswamiji
Dr. B G Sangameshwara
members.position: Vice Chancellor, JSS Science & Technology University

hero.title: JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled
hero.subtitle: Pioneering inclusive technical education since 1992

history.title: Our Beginning
history.description1: JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled was established in 1991-92 as a pioneering institution for technical education for differently-abled students.
history.description2: It was set up with assistance from the World Bank under the Technical Education Project as part of India's commitment to inclusive education.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be a center of excellence in technical education that empowers differently-abled students with knowledge, skills, and confidence to excel in their chosen fields.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide accessible, quality technical education through innovative teaching methodologies, state-of-the-art facilities, and comprehensive support systems.

list.name: Computer Applications for the Visually Impaired

hero.title: Messages
hero.subtitle: Words of wisdom and guidance from our leadership

message.title: Principal's Message
message.content1: Welcome to JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled (JSSPDA), a unique institution that has been at the forefront of inclusive technical education since 1991-92.
message.content2: Our institution was established with the vision of providing quality technical education to differently-abled students, ensuring that physical limitations never become barriers to achieving academic and professional excellence.
message.content3: We take pride in our comprehensive approach that combines academic rigor with practical training, preparing our students for successful careers in various technical fields. Our faculty members are specially trained to understand and address the unique learning needs of our students.
message.content4: I encourage all prospective students to explore the opportunities we offer and join our family of achievers who continue to make remarkable contributions to society.

governingCouncil.description: The Governing Council provides strategic direction and oversight for the institution's operations and development.

iqac.description: Ensures quality enhancement and sustenance in academic and administrative processes.

antiRagging.title: Anti-Ragging Committee
antiRagging.description: Prevents and addresses any instances of ragging to ensure a safe learning environment.

hero.title: JSSPDA Green Initiatives
hero.subtitle: Sustainable and eco-friendly campus designed for environmental responsibility and digital innovation

greenEnvironment.title: Green Environment
features: Campus is covered with trees, flower plants and ornamental plants and lawn which are well maintained
Our campus is specially designed for persons with special needs through international standard accessibility
Regular maintenance of garden, lawn and other trees by the identified agency
The waste collected from trees, biodegradable waste are properly collected and placed in the pits. The manure used as fertilizer for gardening

solarEnergy.title: Solar Energy
features: Solar power generation is set up as an alternate energy source. Around 15,000 units of electricity is expected to generate through solar power
Reduction of CO2 is achieved through solar power
Uninterrupted electrical power supply is provided through centralized generator

waterManagement.title: Water Management
features: Use of rain water for watering trees and plants
Safe & purified drinking water facility is extended to all the departments and hostel
Sufficient water sources through borewells and storage tanks is available for uninterrupted water supply
Proper sewage disposal through UGD is in place

wasteManagement.title: Waste Management
features: Solid waste disposal system is in place
Sign boards regarding cleanliness of campus is placed for user awareness

technology.title: Technology Infrastructure
features: The Campus is enabled with WiFi facility for students and staff
ERP Software is in place for examination, admission, library and other academic activities

security.title: Security & Accessibility
features: The Campus has connected with CCTV surveillance for effective monitoring
Class rooms are equipped with audio visual systems for effective teaching for the differently abled students

gallery.title: Campus Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Visual showcase of our eco-friendly and accessible campus infrastructure

hero.title: JSSPDA Employee Benefits
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive benefits package ensuring security and welfare for all our valued employees

gratuity.title: Gratuity
gratuity.description: It is a prescribed benefit plan and is one of the many retirement privileges by the employer to the employee upon leaving the organization.
features: A person who has served in this organization for at least 5 years is eligible
The employee is eligible for 15 days of salary for every one calendar year of service
Computation based on average salary, dearness allowance, and years of service

epf.title: Employee Provident Fund (EPF) & Employee Pension Scheme
epf.description: Employee Provident Fund (EPF) & Employee Pension Schemes are provided to all eligible employees as per Central Government norms.
features: Employee: 12% of monthly basic salary + dearness allowance (max ceiling Rs. 15,000/-)
Employer: 12% (8.33% towards EFPS + 3.67% EPF)

mediclaim.title: Group Mediclaim Facility
mediclaim.description: Group mediclaim facility is provided to all the employees of JSSPDA (optional) with cashless hospital admission facility.

esi.title: Employee State Insurance Corporation (ESI)
esi.description: ESI Medical Benefits - A comprehensive social security program for workers in the event of medical contingencies, such as sickness, maternity, death, or disablement due to employment injury and occupational disease.
esi.feature: ESI facility is extended to all employees with ceiling limit of total salary Rs. 21,000/- per month

maternity.title: Maternity Benefit
maternity.description: Women Employees can avail maternity leave with full salary and comprehensive support during this important time.
features: 135 days of maternity leave with full salary
Maximum two occasions during service period
ESI Scheme employees: Up to 180 days extended leave

accident.title: Group Personal Accident Policy
accident.description: All JSSPDA Employees are covered under Group Personal Accident Insurance providing comprehensive protection.
features: Sum Assured: Rs. 2,50,000/-
Accidental hospitalization expenses: Up to Rs. 50,000/-
Weekly compensation for temporary total disabilities: Rs. 5,000/- for 52 weeks

edli.title: Early Death Life Insurance (EDLI) Scheme
edli.description: EDLI facility related to the death of the employee during his service period, providing financial security to families.
edli.feature: Extended to all MANAGEMENT employees of JSSPDA up to a limit of Rs. 7,00,000/-

summary.title: Comprehensive Employee Welfare
summary.description: JSSPDA is committed to providing comprehensive benefits that ensure the security, health, and welfare of all our employees and their families.

financial.title: Financial Security
financial.description: Gratuity, EPF, and life insurance coverage

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our institution and programs

1.question: What types of disabilities do you accommodate?
1.answer: Our institution is designed to accommodate students with various disabilities including visual impairment, hearing impairment, mobility challenges, and learning disabilities. Our facilities and teaching methodologies are adapted to meet different needs.

2.question: Do you provide hostel facilities?
2.answer: Yes, we provide separate hostel facilities for male and female students with accessible rooms, common areas, and 24/7 support staff to assist students with their needs.

3.question: What assistive technologies are available?
3.answer: We offer a wide range of assistive technologies including screen readers, magnifiers, speech-to-text software, specialized keyboards, adaptive workstations, and sign language interpretation services.

4.question: How do you help with job placements?
4.answer: Our dedicated placement cell works with industry partners to create employment opportunities for our graduates. We provide career counseling, interview preparation, and job-specific skill development.

5.question: Are scholarships available for students?
5.answer: Yes, we offer various scholarships and financial aid options. These include government scholarships, institutional merit scholarships, and need-based financial assistance programs.

recognition.title: Government Support & Recognition
recognition.description: As per the National Policy of the Government, there is a provision to earmark 3% of the budget for the welfare of differently abled persons. Further there is also reservation in job placements.

national.title: 🏆 National Award (2012)
national.description: "Best Institution working for the cause of Persons with Disabilities" by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of India. The award was presented by His Excellency The President of India.

state.title: 🏆 State Award (2016)
state.description: The Government of Karnataka honored us with a State Award under the category of "Best Institution working for the cause of Persons with Disabilities".

organization.title: Organization Chart of JSSPDA

messages.title: Messages
messages.subtitle: Messages from our leadership and administration

principal.title: MESSAGE FROM PRINCIPAL
principal.designation: Principal, JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled (JSSPDA)

message.para1: In India, a person born with any kind of disability was believed to be a sin in the society. For decades, opportunities in education, employment and other living status was denied for the differently abled even though efforts are being made to rehabilitate them by the Government and other socially responsible organizations both in terms of education and employment.
message.para2: Recent years this trend has changed drastically and many organizations and institutions are inclined towards providing opportunities for the persons with special needs.
message.para3: In this direction, JSS Polytechnic for the Differently Abled, Mysuru was established by JSS Mahavidyapeetha in the year 1991-92 under the World Bank Assistance Scheme of the Government of Karnataka.
message.para4: It was a unique concept conceived and became reality by providing educational and employment opportunities for the persons with disabilities.

council.title: Governing Council
council.description: The Polytechnic has the Governing Council which has a set of members constituted by the Management as per the norms of AICTE for giving guidance regarding administration of the Institution.
council.compositionText: The Governing Council shall have at least 11 members including the Chairman and the Member-Secretary. The Management / Registered Society shall nominate members including the Chairman and the Member-Secretary as indicated below:
